alert.note: Alert for Bradley; Hamilton; Loudon; Marion; McMinn; Meigs; Monroe; Rhea; Roane; Sequatchie (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 12 at 2:24PM CDT until August 12 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 400 PM EDT/300 PM CDT/ FOR RHEA...NORTHWESTERN BRADLEY...SOUTHWESTERN LOUDON...SOUTHEASTERN SEQUATCHIE...MEIGS...CENTRAL MCMINN...SOUTHERN MARION...NORTHWESTERN MONROE...HAMILTON AND SOUTHWESTERN ROANE COUNTIES... At 323 PM EDT/223 PM CDT/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles southwest of Fairview to 10 miles east of Soddy-Daisy to near Jasper, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Law enforcement. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Chattanooga, Cleveland, Athens, Dayton, Sweetwater, Loudon, Jasper, Decatur, Soddy-Daisy, and Signal Mountain. This includes Interstate 75 in Tennessee between mile markers 28 and 71. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Bradley; Hamilton; Loudon; Marion; McMinn; Meigs; Monroe; Rhea; Roane; Sequatchie
